content: Welcome to the CS10 site! If you have any thoughts or questions, please email me at marwahaha@berkeley.edu. This will be an awesome summer!

Homework 2 is due tomorrow night! Use the Discussions tab to get your questions answered, or attend lab section / office hours.
 
If you haven't already, please re-submit HW1 here to make sure we have all solutions.
 
The Quest had an average of 14.5/20. Remember that we have the Clobber Policy - if you do better on the Midterm or Final, your grade will be replaced!
 
Hope you all are enjoying the class so far.

Reminder that the Midterm Project is due tonight!
 
Email marwahaha@berkeley.edu if you have problems with submissions.
 
The midterm will be on Monday, in 306 Soda, from 6-8pm.
 
Hope you all have a great weekend!

Reminder that the Artifact and Blog Comments are due tonight. Please comment on the response above yours, the response below yours, and one of your choice. There is a submission form for the Artifact here: http://tiny.cc/cs10su14artifact

If you have any questions, contact marwahaha@berkeley.edu. We hope you're enjoying the course :-)
